_sText:
scouts_vs_awps
Created by MNtMzng

16 CT Spawns
16 Terrorist Spawns

At the beginning of each round, each team will be randomly assigned "awp" or "scout".

If a team is assigned "awp", they start off with an awp, 10 extra bullets in their gun, and a smoke grenade.
This team has an offensive position.

If a team is assigned "scout", they start off with a scout, 60 extra bullets in their gun, and an assault kit (vest and helmet).
This team has a defensive position.  The building's lights are in their color (t's red, ct's blue).

Thanks to Jotheman for ideas.
Thanks to l33t betatester Kemistry.
